Package: org.codehaus.groovy.ant

[Java] Class FileScanner

        • org.codehaus.groovy.ant.FileScanner

        • FileScanner is a bean which allows the iteration over a number of files from a collection of FileSet instances.

          Authors:
          James Strachan
          Marc Guillemot
          Version:
          \$Revision\$
